Interactive Tech Demo

Experience our cutting-edge technologies in action with live, interactive demonstrations

hextech-demo.js
1// AI-Powered Code Assistant
2import { HexTechAI } from '@hextech/ai-core'
3
4const assistant = new HexTechAI({
5  model: 'hextech-gpt-4',
6  capabilities: ['code-generation', 'debugging', 'optimization']
7})
8
9// Generate optimized React component
10const result = await assistant.generateComponent({
11  type: 'dashboard',
12  features: ['responsive', 'dark-mode', 'animations'],
13  framework: 'react-next'
14})
15
16console.log('Generated component:', result.code)
17// Output: Fully optimized React component with TypeScript
17

~2.3s
